tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Exceptional Dental Implant Procedure Experience with Dr. Urvi Aahar
I recently had the pleasure of undergoing a dental implant procedure performed by Dr. Urvi Aahar, and I must say that my experience was absolutely outstanding. Dr. Aahar's professionalism, expertise, and friendly demeanor truly set her apart as an exceptional dental doctor.
From the moment I stepped into her clinic, Dr. Aahar's warm and welcoming personality immediately put me at ease. She took the time to listen attentively to my concerns and patiently explained the entire dental implant procedure, ensuring that I had a comprehensive understanding of what to expect. Her friendliness and compassionate approach made me feel comfortable and confident in her care.
Dr. Aahar's extensive ********* *** experience in the field of dentistry were evident throughout the entire treatment process. She carefully examined my dental health and explained the underlying issues causing the need for a dental implant. Her clear and concise explanations made it easy for me to comprehend the treatment plan and the benefits of undergoing the procedure.
The actual dental implant procedure was executed with precision and skill. Dr. Aahar's attention to detail was remarkable, and she ensured that I was comfortable at every stage of the process. Her expertise and gentle approach minimized any discomfort I might have experienced, and the procedure progressed smoothly, thanks to her exceptional technique.
One aspect that truly impressed me was the minimal wait time in Roots clinic. They clearly understands the value of their  patients' time and makes every effort to stick to the scheduled appointments. This level of punctuality is truly commendable and demonstrates her commitment to providing a streamlined and efficient experience for her patients.
Post-procedure, Dr. Aahar continued to provide exceptional care and support. She provided detailed instructions on post-operative care, ensuring that I understood how to take care of my dental implant properly. Her availability for follow-up appointments and her willingness to address any concerns or queries I had further exemplified her dedication to her patients' well-being.
In conclusion, my experience with Dr. Urvi Aahar after undergoing a dental implant procedure was nothing short of exceptional. Her friendliness, professionalism, and expertise made the entire process comfortable and reassuring. I highly recommend Dr. Aahar to anyone in need of dental care, as she truly goes above and beyond to ensure her patients' satisfaction and overall dental health.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Good treatment and very quick response.
Nicely explained treatment process and affordable price in the catalog.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had some Sharp On-Off pain in my tooth  for many weeks which I wasn't able to figure it out . It was the first time I needed  to see a dentist privately . So visited a dentist by visiting Practo and checking the online reviews for a nearby dentist . Thus landed on " Roots Dental Clinic -  Dr Meenaz Thakaar "  Thanks to Practo !!!

I was being operated by "Dr Urvi Ashar " . ******** ********* *** **** **  *** ****** ** ***** ***** ******* I had a cavity which had entered the root area and thus I was advised for a root canal . It was a good experience with minimal pain or discomfort during the whole root canal  treatment . It took 3 to 4 sessions for the same followed by permanent filling . 

Root canal was smoothly done by the doctor at Roots Dental Clinic. It was probably due to advancements in the technology  over the years and also precise expertise of the doctor who treated me.  I would recommend , to visit the clinic whenever you need to see a dentist for any tooth related problems . 

Now about the charges , I was being charged 5k for the Root Canal and 1.8 k for the final fillings . You can verify the market price of the treatment and decide for you if it's overpriced or optimum pricing .  Service here is good and doctor is friendly and explained me the minute details which a patient needs to know. 

My advice to others would be - Root Canal nowadays is just like a Cakewalk and can be done with  ease and it won't be that  painful or complex as the term "Root canal" creates a painful picture in the back of your mind . Get it done immediately to arrest further decay of your tooth .

Overall it was a great experience getting my Root Canal treatment at the " Roots Dental Clinic Chembur by Dr Urvi Ashar  \

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I highly recommend roots dental clinic for tooth related problems 
Dr urviashar is  very ************* * polite in behaviour

tags: Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr. URVI ASHAR is a rare and perfect blend of professional dental health consultation/treatment and personal care. I strongly recommend ROOTS DENTAL CLINIC and Dr. URVI ASHAR for prompt, effective, efficient and reasonably priced dental health consultation, treatment and care. The service levels pre, during and post treatment are impeccable for its simplicity and effectiveness; all this in a cool ambience with a pleasantly humane approach - thus making for a supreme dental experience for all dental hygiene and healthcare issues.
I and my mother will always be thankful to Dr. URVI ASHAR for restoring back our consciousness and confidence in dental health and hygiene; gum disease treatment/surgery and splinting in my case, filling and tooth extraction in the case of my mother. Dr. URVI's passion for her profession and her humane and personal caring demeanour is truly admirable. My best wishes for happiness and success in all her professional and personal endeavours.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I visited Roots Dental Clinic for getting my cavities filled and for finding out a cure for my tooth extraction done in past.

Dr. Urvi Ashar explained the whole procedure and advantages of Dental Implant. Being a complicated case, I really appreciate her ability of getting it right with painless treatment. 

Also, during my dental check up, she advised me for extraction of wisdom tooth as it had cavity and root canal treatment would be not successful and might lead to complications.

I would definately recommend her !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Urvi Ashar and the team at Roots Dental Clinic have been fantastic. My front tooth was in a bad condition and have always done composite filling with my childhood dentist but it always had a stain and lacked finish. 
I then decided to go to Dr Urvi and she completely transformed it. My front tooth  has never been in a better and healthier condition. I must thank Dr Urvi for a confident smile now. The follow up appointments have been great and more importantly the treatment is painfree.
It's a state of the art clinic and I would strongly recommend Dr Urvi to anyone who is looking for a healthier teeth coupled with a professional and a pain free treatment 

Thank you
Ram

tags: None
review:
I visited Dr. Urvi Ashar to get my tooth extracted. She explained to me the present condition of my tooth (using X-Ray ) and the extraction procedure very clearly.
The surgery was smooth and pain free and did not take much time. I felt completely relaxed before and during the surgery.
Precautions and medicines to be taken after the surgery were clearly explained *** **** **********
Doctor was kind enough to call me and check about my condition, even after the surgery.
I highly recommend Dr. Urvi Ashar.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was having cavity in my wisdom tooth. So i had to go through root canal treatment. I am a person having phobia to all these treatment.. so i was really frightened. But the way she did my RCT and the way the make me comfortable, I really appreciate and recommend everyone to Dr. Urvi ashar. She explained  what had  happened to my tooth n what possible options i was having  . While other dentist  told me to remove tooth,she gave option for RCT. My RCT was done in just one sitting and it was done with such a perfection that i didn't have to take even a crocin tablet . Then after one week i got permanent filling for that. So i will recommend Dr. Urvi Ashar to everyone who want to have their treatment go smoothly and without any pain

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I visited her for a fairly basic scaling procedure (plaque removal) and honestly, there's little scope to go wrong with something as regular as this. The only expectation I had was that the dentist be gentle and not make the procedure painful or uncomfortable. I was pretty satisfied on that front.

Besides this, she did explain a few potential risks and how I could undergo certain treatments to avoid future problems. I liked her salesmanship; since it was very subtle and earnest, unlike some dentists and doctors who tend to oversell unnecessary things.

tags: None
review: Amazing docter & painless treatments , even docter attends in case of  in urgency ..sometimes,seems a bit costly

tags: None
review:
I first visited Dr Urvi after suffering from acute, recurring toothache. After careful examination, she advised me to undergo Root Canal Treatment. 
She is extremely professional, and ensures your comfort and convenience - be in terms of slotting appointments, or if you wish to pay for the treatment as it progresses. 
Another thing about Dr Urvi, which I personally have seen lack in many doctors nowadays, is that she will take time to explain exactly what is wrong with you, how the treatment is going to take place, what your recommended practices should be while undergoing treatment. 
I am well on my way to recovery now, and really happy with my experience!

tags: None
review:
I am MANI aged 77.
Slightly diabetic.
Over more than a decade  my upper row teeth have become 
Vulnerable and gone on decaying  though with reasonably good care.
I was skeptical , constantly fearing  the treatment , apart from cost,
 The pain and conseqences plus the factor of landing  at a safe, sound
Dental clinic. That's when I stuck Roots Clinicby sheer providence.
True to expectation the treatment is going on well and to my entire
 Satisfaction. Hopes and confidence since have soared and feel
Comfortable thanks to the team at Roots.
MANI

Dr. Urvi was quite caring and was detailed in explaining the need for every action and the consequences. The entire process was pain free, courtesy Drs, careful and sensitive approach.
Would recommend for everyone especially Kids and Elderly patients since wait time is almost nil with appointments and very flexible staffs.

review:
I am happy that I came across a really very good dentist.  I appreciate her soft spokenness, patience in explaining the actual problem to the patient and allowing the patient to decide whether the treatment can be started immediately or not depending upon the intensity of the problem.
Charges are also highly reasonable.  Normally I consider going to the dentist a real nightmare and I think 10 times before I go to any dentist.  But treatment under Dr. Urvi Ashar is a totally different experience which cannot be explained.
